actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services. subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy

official_title: Urging the President of the United States to seek negotiations with the Republic of Ireland, the United Kingdom, the European Union, and international financial institutions for the purpose of establishing an Ireland Development Bank.

summary.text: Urges the President to seek negotiations with the Republic of Ireland, the United Kingdom, the European Union, and international financial institutions to establish an Ireland Development Bank to raise capital for economic development and job creation in the Republic of Ireland, especially the six border counties, and the six counties of Northern Ireland, through the issuance of Ireland Peace Bonds, the proceeds of which would be used to provide supplemental loans and loan guarantees for businesses underserved by other financial institutions.

titles.title: Urging the President of the United States to seek negotiations with the Republic of Ireland, the United Kingdom, the European Union, and international financial institutions for the purpose of establishing an Ireland Development Bank.
